page.title: 11Schools in Creeting St. Mary
page.content: THE CHURCH SCHOOL Creeting St. Mary V.A.P. school is a first school, which means that it caters for children from the ages of 5 -9 years. The religious education and collective worship is in accordance with the Church of England. At present 39 children attend the school and are taught in two classes. Much of the time the children are taught individually or in groups. CREETING HOUSE SCHOOL Creeting House School is a private,co-educational day school housed in the former rectory of St. Mary's Church. It is run on Christian principles. At present there are 80 pupils between the ages of 3 and 14,{which is extending to 16, in order to enter for O-level examinations.}
